name: Event Planning
description: Corporate event planning and execution project

template.title: Corporate Event Planning & Execution
template.description: Complete planning and execution of corporate event including venue booking, catering, entertainment, logistics, and post-event follow-up.

tasks.name: Event Concept & Planning
tasks.notes: Define event objectives, theme, target audience, initial planning

tasks.name: Budget Planning & Approval
tasks.notes: Create detailed budget breakdown, get stakeholder approval

tasks.name: Venue Research & Booking
tasks.notes: Research venues, site visits, contract negotiation, booking confirmation

tasks.name: Vendor Selection & Contracts
tasks.notes: Select caterers, photographers, entertainment, AV equipment suppliers

tasks.name: Marketing & Promotion
tasks.notes: Create invitations, promotional materials, registration system, marketing campaign

tasks.name: Registration Management
tasks.notes: Process registrations, track RSVPs, manage guest list, send confirmations

tasks.name: Catering & Menu Planning
tasks.notes: Menu selection, dietary requirements, final headcount, catering coordination

tasks.name: Entertainment & Speakers
tasks.notes: Book keynote speakers, entertainment, rehearsals, technical requirements

tasks.name: Logistics & Setup Planning
tasks.notes: Create event timeline, setup schedule, staffing plan, equipment requirements

tasks.name: Event Day Coordination
tasks.notes: On-site coordination, setup supervision, guest management, troubleshooting

tasks.name: Event Breakdown & Cleanup
tasks.notes: Coordinate venue breakdown, equipment return, final cleanup

tasks.name: Post-Event Follow-up
tasks.notes: Send thank you notes, gather feedback, process final invoices, event report
